title: Learning Style-Based Strategies for Enhancing Mathematics Achievement

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental arithmetic operations and elementary-level mathematical concepts
context.additional_context: Real-time online classes conducted in environments supporting smartphone-based learning

learning_goals: Analyzing individual cognitive, sensory, and social learning tendencies with 80% accuracy using a learning style diagnostic tool
Applying three or more personalized math problem-solving strategies tailored to learning style types
Achieving a 30% improvement in academic performance compared to pre-assessment when applying instructional methods based on learning styles

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
